mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mobile(mno, category , nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, telecome, userid) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(mno), 0) + 1 as mno FROM mobile), #{category}, #{nickname}, #{passwd}, #{deal_way}, #{deal_code}, #{product_code}, #{hprice}, #{region}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{quantity}, #{title}, #{content}, #{purc_date},#{telecome} ,#{userid})
mapper.select: SELECT mno, category , nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, wdate, cnt, telecome, userid FROM mobile ORDER BY mno ASC
SELECT mno, category , nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, wdate, cnt, telecome ,userid FROM mobile WHERE mno= #{mno}

SELECT COUNT (*) as cnt FROM mobile
where title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT mno, category , nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, wdate, telecome, file1, file2, size2, cnt, userid, r FROM( SELECT mno, category , nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, wdate, telecome, file1, file2, size2, cnt, userid, rownum as r FROM( SELECT mno, category , nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, wdate, telecome, file1, file2, size2, cnt,userid FROM mobile
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE category LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY mno DESC ) ) WHERE r >= #{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
